text: Heart Beat is a 1980 American romantic drama movie directed by John Byrum and was based on the autobiography by Carolyn Cassady. It stars Nick Nolte, John Heard, Sissy Spacek, Ray Sharkey, David Lynch, Tony Bill, John Larroquette, Don Brodie and John Bennett Perry. It was distributed by Orion Pictures and was a box office disappointment. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 romantic drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies based on autobiographies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Heart Beat (movie)
